languages.text: "Скорее мон-кай боится последствий, которые повлечет за собой попытка избавиться от меня". {n}Друкари без всякого пиетета взирает на Калькасара, кажется, и не подозревая, с кем именно он говорит.{/n}

"I rather think the mon-keigh fears what may befall her should she try to get rid of me." {n}The Drukhari stares baldly at Calcazar with no deference whatsoever. Perhaps he has no inkling of who he is talking to.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Скорее мон-кай боится последствий, которые повлечет за собой попытка избавиться от меня". {n}Друкари без всякого пиетета взирает на Калькасара, кажется, и не подозревая, с кем именно он говорит.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "I'd rather say the mon-keigh is afraid of the consequences of trying to get rid of me." {n}The Drukhari looks at Calcazar with no deference whatsoever. Perhaps he has no inkling of who he's talking to.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I rather think the mon-keigh fears what may befall her should she try to get rid of me." {n}The Drukhari stares baldly at Calcazar with no deference whatsoever. Perhaps he has no inkling of who he is talking to.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "I rather think the mon-keigh fears what may befall her should she try to get rid of me." {n}The Drukhari stares baldly at Calcazar with no deference whatsoever. Perhaps he has no inkling of who he is talking to.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: “伊芮梅莉斯打算把我干掉，结果落得了这样的下场。我觉得这个猴子不敢招惹我，因为他害怕会落得同样的下场。”{n}玛拉斋目中无人地盯着卡尔卡扎，没有丝毫敬意，或许他根本不知道他眼前的这个人是谁。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I rather think the mon-keigh fears what may befall her should she try to get rid of me." {n}The Drukhari stares baldly at Calcazar with no deference whatsoever. Perhaps he has no inkling of who he is talking to.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “伊芮梅莉斯打算把我干掉，结果落得了这样的下场。我觉得这个猴子不敢招惹我，因为他害怕会落得同样的下场。”{n}玛拉斋目中无人地盯着卡尔卡扎，没有丝毫敬意，或许他根本不知道他眼前的这个人是谁。{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: 「どちらかと言えば、モン＝ケイは俺を追い払った後に彼女に何が起きるのかを恐れている」{n}デュカーリはカルカサルを、尊敬の欠片もない眼差しで見た。恐らく、自分が話している相手が誰なのか、分かっていないのだろう。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I rather think the mon-keigh fears what may befall her should she try to get rid of me." {n}The Drukhari stares baldly at Calcazar with no deference whatsoever. Perhaps he has no inkling of who he is talking to.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「どちらかと言えば、モン＝ケイは俺を追い払った後に彼女に何が起きるのかを恐れている」{n}デュカーリはカルカサルを、尊敬の欠片もない眼差しで見た。恐らく、自分が話している相手が誰なのか、分かっていないのだろう。{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: «Yo diría que esa mon-keigh teme el destino que podría sufrir al intentar deshacerse de mí». {n}El Drukhari mira descaradamente a Calcazar sin deferencia alguna. Quizá no tenga ni idea de con quién está hablando.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I rather think the mon-keigh fears what may befall her should she try to get rid of me." {n}The Drukhari stares baldly at Calcazar with no deference whatsoever. Perhaps he has no inkling of who he is talking to.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Yo diría que esa mon-keigh teme el destino que podría sufrir al intentar deshacerse de mí». {n}El Drukhari mira descaradamente a Calcazar sin deferencia alguna. Quizá no tenga ni idea de con quién está hablando.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Ich denke eher, die Chem-Pan-Sey hat Angst, was sie befallen könnte, wenn sie versucht, mich loszuwerden." {n}Der Drukhari starrt Calcazar ohne das kleinste Zeichen von Respekt an. Möglicherweise hat er keine Ahnung, mit wem er spricht.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I rather think the mon-keigh fears what may befall her should she try to get rid of me." {n}The Drukhari stares baldly at Calcazar with no deference whatsoever. Perhaps he has no inkling of who he is talking to.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ich würde eher sagen, der Chem-Pan-Sey fürchtet die Konsequenzen des Versuchs, mich zu beseitigen." {n}Der Drukhari blickt Calcazar ohne jede Ehrerbietung an. Vielleicht hatte er keine Ahnung, mit wem er spricht.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: « Je dirais plutôt que la mon-keigh a peur de ce qu'il pourrait advenir si elle essayait de se débarrasser de moi. » {n}Le Drukhari dévisage Calcazar sans la moindre déférence. Sans doute ignore-t-il à qui il s'adresse.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I rather think the mon-keigh fears what may befall her should she try to get rid of me." {n}The Drukhari stares baldly at Calcazar with no deference whatsoever. Perhaps he has no inkling of who he is talking to.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Je dirais plutôt que la mon-keigh a peur de ce qu'il pourrait advenir si elle essayait de se débarrasser de moi. » {n}Le Drukhari dévisage Calcazar sans la moindre déférence. Sans doute ignore-t-il à qui il s'adresse.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Herhâlde mon-keigh, benden kurtulmaya kalkarsa kendine olacaklardan korkuyor." {n}Drukhari, gözlerini dobralıkla Calcazar'a dikerken hiç riayet göstermiyor. Belki de kiminle konuştuğunun farkında değil.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I rather think the mon-keigh fears what may befall her should she try to get rid of me." {n}The Drukhari stares baldly at Calcazar with no deference whatsoever. Perhaps he has no inkling of who he is talking to.{/n}
